title: Drawing, "Temple of Eternity"
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash
markings: Verso: Cooper Union Museum for the Arts of Decoration (Lugt#457d)
inscribed:
Inscription: Tempio della Eternita
Upper right: 17
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Horizontal rectangle; interior of temple, very wide and lofty showing circular domed contruction in middle of background; decorated with statues.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Temple of Eternity".
Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-130.
